sense.def:
To be prepared to do something
pomeni biti voljan nekaj storiti.

seg.quote: I'm prepared to say I was wrong.
Many countries seem prepared to consider nuclear energy.

sense.def:
To be prepared for something
pomeni biti nared za nekaj, kar se utegne zgoditi.

seg.quote: Be prepared for power cuts by buying lots of candles.

sense.def:
Kar je
prepared
, je bilo narejeno vnaprej.

seg.quote: He read out a prepared statement.
